basics.name: Paridhi Rustogi
basics.label: Ph.D. Candidate, Biogeochemical Oceanography
basics.summary: Ph.D. Candidate in Geosciences at Princeton University, researching the impact of wind-wave-bubble variability on air-sea gas exchange and ocean carbon and oxygen cycling. Experienced in ocean biogeochemical modeling, climate data analysis, and science communication.

work.name: Princeton University
work.summary: Studying the impact of wind-wave-bubble variability on the air-sea gas exchange of carbon and oxygen and the resulting impact on ocean interior storage.

work.name: Institute of Oceanography, University of Hamburg
work.summary: Applied statistical analyses of air–sea CO2 fluxes using MPI-GE output and assimilation based on MPI-ESM (EnKF), benchmarking against observation-based pCO2 products.

work.name: International Water Management Institute
work.summary: Curated and systematized a global database of educational resources on waste resource recovery and reuse.

work.name: Global Water Partnership South Asia
work.summary: Researched and authored case studies on climate adaptation and water security across South Asia, informing regional policy.

work.name: Indian Institute of Technology Delhi
work.summary: Contributed to manuscript preparation on model-based projections of India’s hydrological cycle under a geoengineering scenario.

education.summary: Thesis: Constraining the Impact of Wind-wave-bubble Variability on the Air-sea Gas Exchange
Thesis: Seasonal Analysis of Atmosphere-Ocean Carbon Flux Variability in the North Atlantic and the Southern Ocean
Thesis: Comparative Analysis of Air Quality in Major Cities of India

awards.title: Climate and Environmental Sciences and Engineering (CESEn) Fellow
Centennial Fellowship in the Natural Sciences and Engineering
DAAD Merit Scholarship for International Students
Telenor Youth Forum Winner – Project GreenCred
Excellence Award
awards.awarder: Ministry of Environment, Republic of Korea

publications.name: A universal wind-wave-bubble formulation for air-sea gas exchange and its impact on oxygen fluxes
publications.summary: Develops a universal wave-bubble formulation and quantifies its role in oxygen fluxes.

publications.name: Influence of wave-induced variability on ocean carbon uptake
publications.summary: Assesses the effect of wave-driven variability on air-sea CO₂ fluxes and carbon storage.

publications.name: The impact of seasonality on the annual air-sea carbon flux and its interannual variability
publications.summary: Examines seasonal and interannual variability of CO₂ flux in the North Atlantic and Southern Ocean.

publications.name: Ecological benefits of reviving urban water bodies using rainwater harvesting
Revival and rejuvenation strategy of water bodies in a metropolitan city: a case study of Najafgarh lake, Delhi, India

skills.name: Modeling & Data
keywords: Climate Data Analysis (World Ocean Database, SOCOM, BGC-Argo, GLODAP)
